text: Lamerd County () is a county in Fars Province in Iran. The capital of the county is Lamerd.Gitashenasi Province Atlas of Iranاطلس گیتاشناسی استان‌های ایران At the 2006 census, the county's population was 76,971, in 16,602 families. The county is subdivided into three districts: the Central District, Eshkanan District, and the Alamarvdasht District. The county has four cities: Lamerd, Ahel, Alamarvdasht, and Eshkanan. Lamerd was historically part of the region of Irahistan. The people of Lamerd are closely related to the Achomi people.ABO and Rh blood groups distribution in the populations of Larestan and Lamerd, Fars province Iran.
